title: Ocean World Short Story Collection
description: (Young Adults 12-20) A collection of three role playing games that are a supplement/add-on to the Ocean World Board Game that was released in 2016. A collection of three short stories that is a supplement/add-on to the Ocean World Board Game which was published in 2016. These stories give more back ground information to The Ocean World environment, which the main stories take place in. These stories give a historical time-line detailing the sequence of events that occur throughout different time periods. Also introduced are new character and creature kingdoms. Please note that this is not a full length feature book..
author: Ian Allan
